channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Customer Wars
channel.desc: At a convenience store in Reno, Nevada, a shift change between two employees escalates into a heated argument; in a fast food restaurant in Santa Monica, California, a security guard finds himself under siege while bystanders attempt to diffuse the situation; in Eatontown, New Jersey, a rideshare trip gets cut short after passengers appear to push their driver too far; in Seattle, Washington, a blind man and his service dog are unjustly ejected from a restaurant by an employee who.
